title: Processors documentation

This folder documents the complex programs of the EvoX algo.

# General info

A processor can be viewed as an organ, a structure that can perform a non atomic operation.
Processors are composed of progteins and molecules.
(a processor only composed of molecules is a progtein)

## Core processors

These correspond to the teleonomical IDs between 0 and 99.

* 1 : main function
* 2 : core switcher

## Genesis processors

These correspond to the teleonomical IDs between 100 and 199.

* 103 : free molecules picker wrapper
* 105 : meta-sequential transcriber
* 106 : mRNA meta-aggregator

## Metabolic processors

* 206 : ribosome
* 208 : transcriber
